Cache.java   
1   package org.apache.lucene.util.cache;
2

19  
20  
21  /**
22   * Base class for cache implementations.
23   */
24  public abstract class Cache {
25    
26    /**
27     * Simple Cache wrapper that synchronizes all
28     * calls that access the cache. 
29     */
30    static class SynchronizedCache extends Cache {
31      Object mutex;
32      Cache  cache;
33      
34      SynchronizedCache(Cache cache) {
35        this.cache = cache;
36        this.mutex = this;
37      }
38      
39      SynchronizedCache(Cache cache, Object mutex) {
40        this.cache = cache;
41        this.mutex = mutex;
42      }
43      
44      public void put(Object key, Object value) {
45        synchronized(mutex) {cache.put(key, value);}
46      }
47      
48      public Object get(Object key) {
49        synchronized(mutex) {return cache.get(key);}
50      }
51      
52      public boolean containsKey(Object key) {
53        synchronized(mutex) {return cache.containsKey(key);}
54      }
55      
56      public void close() {
57        synchronized(mutex) {cache.close();}
58      }
59      
60      Cache getSynchronizedCache() {
61        return this;
62      }
63    }
64    
65    /**
66     * Returns a thread-safe cache backed by the specified cache. 
67     * In order to guarantee thread-safety, all access to the backed cache must
68     * be accomplished through the returned cache.
69     */
70    public static Cache synchronizedCache(Cache cache) {
71      return cache.getSynchronizedCache();
72    }
73  
74    /**
75     * Called by {@link #synchronizedCache(Cache)}. This method
76     * returns a {@link SynchronizedCache} instance that wraps
77     * this instance by default and can be overridden to return
78     * e. g. subclasses of {@link SynchronizedCache} or this
79     * in case this cache is already synchronized.
80     */
81    Cache getSynchronizedCache() {
82      return new SynchronizedCache(this);
83    }
84    
85    /**
86     * Puts a (key, value)-pair into the cache. 
87     */
88    public abstract void put(Object key, Object value);
89    
90    /**
91     * Returns the value for the given key. 
92     */
93    public abstract Object get(Object key);
94    
95    /**
96     * Returns whether the given key is in this cache. 
97     */
98    public abstract boolean containsKey(Object key);
99    
100   /**
101    * Closes the cache.
102    */
103   public abstract void close();
104   
105 }
106
